has_manual_label: Do you need an introduction to sailing manual? (35$)
has_logbook_label: Do you need the International Cruising Sailing Booklet (logbook)? (25$)
has_exam_label: Do you want to take the sailing canada exam to become a skipper or a crew member? (45$)
terms_accepted_label: Do you accept the liability disclaimer?
terms_description: The trainees and/or passengers are aware and well informed that life on the water and on a sailboat, as well as the use of the latter and its equipment, involve hazards, inconveniences and unusual risks, and they release Pierre Ricard and the 4-vents sailing school, from any liability for any bodily or moral injury or material damage suffered by a trainee and/or any person accompanying him.
